title: Air Waybill Certificate
description: Air Waybill based on IATA Air Waybill Resolution 600a https://www.iata.org/contentassets/e9cb5a72b88f4f68a5cfc572a50b60c9/eacph-european-air-cargo-programme-handbook.pdf and https://www.iata.org/contentassets/b559d10aeb734d5196332b4953dcf312/e-awb-sop-hyd.pdf

airlineCodeNumber.title: Airline Code Number
airlineCodeNumber.description: The issuing carrier's three-digit IATA airline code number shall be inserted. Box 1A.

serialNumber.title: Serial Number
serialNumber.description: A serial number of eight digits including a check digit placed in the extreme right position shall be inserted. Box 1B.

airportOfDeparture.title: Airport of Departure
airportOfDeparture.description: The IATA three-letter code of the airport of departure (or city when the name of the airport is unknown). Box 1.

conditionsOfContract.title: Reference to Conditions of Contract
conditionsOfContract.description: This box shall not be completed unless used by the issuing carrier at its option.

shipper.title: Shipper's Name and Address
shipper.description: The name, address and country (or two-letter country code) of the shipper (or IATA Cargo Intermediary when acting in its capacity as a Forwarder) shall be inserted. Box 2.

shippersAccountNumber.title: Shipper's Account Number
shippersAccountNumber.description: This box shall not be completed unless used by the issuing carrier at its option. Box 3.

consignee.title: Consignee's Name and Address
consignee.description: The name, address and country (or two-letter country code) of the consignee shall be inserted. Box 4.

consigneesAccountNumber.title: Consignee's Account Number
consigneesAccountNumber.description: This box shall not be completed unless used by the last carrier at its option. Box 5.

issuingCarrierAgent.title: Issuing Carrier's Agent
issuingCarrierAgent.description: The name and location (airport or city) of the issuing carrier's IATA Cargo Agent (or IATA Cargo Intermediary when acting in its capacity as the issuing carrier's agent). Box 6.

agentIATACode.title: Agent's IATA Code
agentIATACode.description: IATA code of the Cargo Agent (or IATA Cargo Intermediary when acting in its capacity as the issuing carrier's agent). Box 7.

requestedRouting.title: Airport of Departure and Requested Routing
requestedRouting.description: The name of the airport of departure. Box 9.

firstCarrierDestination.title: To (by First Carrier)
firstCarrierDestination.description: The IATA three-letter code of the airport of destination or first transfer point (or city when the name of the airport is unknown because the city is served by more than one airport) may be inserted. Box 11A.

firstCarrier.title: By First Carrier
firstCarrier.description: The name of the first carrier (either full name or IATA two-character code) shall be inserted. Box 11B.

secondCarrierDestination.title: To (by Second Carrier)
secondCarrierDestination.description: The IATA three-letter code of the airport of destination or second transfer point (or city when the name of the airport is unknown because the city is served by more than one airport) may be inserted. Box 11C.

secondCarrier.title: By Second Carrier
secondCarrier.description: The IATA two-character code of the second carrier may be inserted. Box 11D.

thirdCarrierDestination.title: To (by Third Carrier)
thirdCarrierDestination.description: The IATA three-letter code of the airport of destination or third transfer point (or city when the name of the airport is unknown because the city is served by more than one airport) may be inserted. Box 11E.

thirdCarrier.title: By Third Carrier
thirdCarrier.description: The IATA two-character code of the third carrier may be inserted. Box 11F.

destinationAirport.title: Airport of Destination
destinationAirport.description: The airport of destination of the last carrier (or city when the name of the airport is unknown because the city is served by more than one airport) shall be inserted. Box 18.

requestedFlight.title: Requested Flight
requestedFlight.description: Completed by the carrier/agent/shipper effecting the booking. Box 19A.

requestedDate.title: Requested Date
requestedDate.description: Completed by the carrier/agent/shipper effecting the booking. Box 19B.

accountingInformation.title: Accounting Information
accountingInformation.description: Only accounting information required by the participating carriers may be inserted. Box 10.
enum: Payment by Miscellaneous Charges Order (MCO) is only acceptable for baggage shipped as cargo; the MCO number and value of the Exchange Coupon in the currency of the air waybill shall be shown followed, if necessary, by the amount deducted from the MCO coupon and, in all cases, by the passenger's ticket number and flight/date/routing used
Payment by Government Bill of Lading (GBL); the GBL number shall be shown
Consignment returned because of non-delivery; the original air waybill number shall be shown on the new air waybill for the returning carriage
Shipper's reference number as indicated by the shipper or his agent
Payment by credit card; the credit card number shall be shown
The words “Also Notify” may be printed after the title of the “Accounting Information” box (applicable for domestic transportation only)

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The ISO three-letter currency code of the currency applicable in the country of departure, according to the applicable rating rules, shall be inserted.

chargeCodes.title: Charges Codes
enum: CE—partial collect credit card—partial prepaid cash
CH—partial collect credit card—partial prepaid credit
CZ—all charges collect by credit card
NG—no weight charge—other charges prepaid by GBL
NP—no weight charge—other charges prepaid cash
NX—no weight charge—other charges prepaid credit
NZ—no weight charge—other charges prepaid by credit card
PE—partial prepaid credit card—partial collect cash
PF—partial prepaid credit card—partial collect credit card
PH—partial prepaid credit card—partial collect credit PP—all charges prepaid by cash
PZ—all charges prepaid by credit card

declaredValueForCarriage.title: Declared Value For Carriage
declaredValueForCarriage.description: The declared value for carriage, as specified by the shipper, shall be inserted. Where no value is declared, “NVD” shall be inserted. Box 16.

declaredValueForCustoms.title: Declared Value For Customs
declaredValueForCustoms.description: The shipper or agent may declare and insert a customs value, which may be NCV, or leave the box blank. Box 17.

handlingInformation.title: Handling Information
handlingInformation.description: Only clear and concise information as required by the participating carriers shall be inserted. In the case of dangerous goods for which a Shipper's Declaration is required, a statement: “Dangerous Goods as per attached Shipper's Declaration” or “Dangerous Goods as per attached DGD” and where applicable the statement “Cargo Aircraft Only” or “CAO”. When dangerous goods are contained in a consignment with non-dangerous goods, the number of pieces of dangerous goods must be indicated either before or after the statement “Dangerous Goods as per attached Shipper's Declaration” or “Dangerous Goods as per attached DGD”. Other handling information using, where available, the codes and abbreviations in Cargo-IMP, may be inserted, such as: marks and numbers which appear on the consignment and method of packing; name, address, country or two-letter country code and one or more method of contact (telephone, telex or telefax) and number of any person to be notified of arrival of the consignment in addition to the consignee; name of documents to accompany the air waybill, such as the “Shipper's Certification for Live Animals”; special handling instructions that may be required; when not preprinted, and if the air waybill is issued in the United States, the statement: “These commodities, technology or software were exported from the United States in accordance with the Export Administration Regulations. Diversion contrary to USA law prohibited”; Agent Nomination when a consignment's details, including house waybill details, must be reported to Customs and the agent has elected to undertake that reporting, the human readable statement “House Information transmitted to (country name) by:”, or the coded statement “(Country ISO Code) - AGT-” shall be entered in the Handling Information box on the master air waybill and either statement shall be followed by the appropriate agent identifier as specified by that country (multiple entries may be necessary if more than one country requires information). When a local transfer at destination is required and known the statement “Local transfer at destination to:” or “FIRMS-” shall be entered in the Handling Information box on the air waybill followed by the appropriate location identifier, e.g. FIRMS code for the United States. Box 21.

specialCustomsInformation.title: Special Customs Information (SCI)
specialCustomsInformation.description: When a consignment is loaded or reloaded at an airport in an European Union country, the Customs Origin Code shall be inserted. When a consignment is not loaded or reloaded at an airport in an European Union country, then this box may be used for other customs information. Box 21A.

consignmentRatingDetails.title: Consignment Rating Details
consignmentRatingDetails.description: A separate set of entries shall be made for each rated group of items, each set commencing on a new line, dangerous goods items, if any, being entered first. Box 22.

totalNumberOfPieces.title: Total Number of Pieces
totalNumberOfPieces.description: Where there is more than one numeric entry in box 22A, the total number of pieces shall be inserted. Box 22J.

totalGrossWeight.title: Total Gross Weight
totalGrossWeight.description: Where there is more than one entry in box 22B, the total gross weight shall be inserted. Box 22K.

totalCharge.title: Total Charge
totalCharge.description: Where there is more than one entry in box 22H, the sum shall be inserted. Box 22L

otherCharges.title: Other Charges
otherCharges.description: Other charges incurred at origin shall be inserted at the time of air waybill issuance as either wholly prepaid or wholly collect. Box 23.

prepaidTotal.title: Total Prepaid
prepaidTotal.description: The total of all the prepaid charges, i.e. weight/volume charge, valuation charge, other prepaid charges due carrier and, if applicable, tax and other charges due agent. Box 30A.

destinationCollectChargeDeclaration.title: Destination Collect Charge Declaration
destinationCollectChargeDeclaration.description: Collect charges at destination, incl. currency exchange.

collectTotal.title: Total Collect Charges
collectTotal.description: The sum of boxes (33B) and (33C). Box 33D.

shippersCertificationBox.title: Shipper's Certification Box
shippersCertificationBox.description: When not preprinted, the signature of the shipper or his agent (printed, signed or stamped). Box 31.

executedOn.title: Executed on (Date)
executedOn.description: The date of execution of the air waybill shall be inserted in the sequence of day, month and year. The month shall be expressed alphabetically, either abbreviated or in full. Box 32A.

executedAt.title: At (Place)
executedAt.description: The name of the place of execution (airport or city) of the air waybill shall be inserted. Box 32B.

referenceNumber.title: Reference Number
referenceNumber.description: Reference number may be inserted as per shipper/agent/issuing carrier agreement. Box 34A.

optionalShippingInformation.title: Optional Shipping Information
optionalShippingInformation.description: The shipper or its Agent may enter the appropriate optional shipping information as agreed upon with the issuing carrier. Shading of these boxes will indicate non-use. Box 34B.
